net.sf.mmm.search

Interface NlsBundleSearchRoot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NlsBundle

    public interface NlsBundleSearchRoot
extends NlsBundle
    This interface holds the internationalized messages for this module.
    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • msgResultRange

        NlsMessage msgResultRange(@Named(value="start")
                          Number start,
                          @Named(value="end")
                          Number end,
                          @Named(value="size")
                          Number size,
                          @Named(value="query")
                          String query)
        Message for hits of search-page.
        Parameters:
        start - the paging start index.
        end - the paging end index.
        size - the number of hits on the page.
        query - the escaped query.
        Returns:
        the NlsMessage
